Name: Cruise Control Mode On!
About the game: This is about adrenaline. Cruise Control Mode On it's a racing game where your mission is to drive as many km as possible on the highway without having an accident. It gives you the opportunity to check your reaction and your driving skills, making as many overtakes as possible to show who is the coolest on the highway. Drive carefully, the fines are quite high. Game Features : - A garage full of the coolest racing cars - Daily Reward - Depending on the distance traveled, the speed and dose of adrenaline becomes higher and higher
